id.description: The namespaced identifier with which the validator registers.

name.description: The Title Cased human-readable name for the validator.

description.description: A description that concisely states the expected behaviour of the validator.

author.description: The primary contact for the validator's git repository.

maintainers.description: A list of all contacs for the validator's git repository.

repository.description: The git repository that contains the source code for this validator.

namespace.description: The organizational namespace for this validator; the prefix of the id.

packageName.description: The python package name for this validator; typically the same as the repository name and the suffix of the id.

moduleName.description: The python module name for this validator; typically "validator"

postInstall.description: The file path, relative to the module directory, to the post-install script for this validator.

index.description: The file path, relative to the module directory, to the index file for this validator.

exports.description: The exports from the validator module; typically at least the validator's class name.

requiresAuth.description: Indicates whether the user must be authenticated to install this validator.

featured.description: Indicates whether this validator is currently featured.
